creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by the Peter B. McCord Collection
description: five-parts; silver lacquer background; two birds on each side perched on craggy cherry tree; a few gold highlights on flowers; brown cord
medium: Lacquer, silver ground, mura nashiji, gold and colored togidashi
title: [Inrō showing two birds seated on branch of tree, two birds above flowering azalea]
